timeline.bodyText:
minor: use ObjectMappers.storeMapper()#writeValue(OutputStream, Object) to save some heap space, avoid String allocations and unnecessary UTF-16 shenanigans.
That way you can also pass in a GZIPOutputStream directly to the writeValue() method and allow chunked encoding of the whole jobDescriptor.
